data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_28036c4584c914c5aad4d2feeafb2452.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Lapu-Lapu accumulates 10 <font color="a6aafb">Bravery Blessing</font> each time he deals damage (halved for damage dealt to non-hero units). When <font color="a6aafb">Bravery Blessing</font> is full, Lapu-Lapu's next <font color="a6aafb">Basic Attack</font> will make him dash toward the target, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+150% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (cannot Crit) and granting him a shield that absorbs 250 (+65*Hero Level) damage for 2.5s.

Lapu-Lapu releases two boomerangs in the target direction, each boomerang dealing 140<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit on its way out and back.

Enemies hit by both boomerangs take 50% damage from the second hit.
Lapu-Lapu dashes in the target direction, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way.

Lapu-Lapu leaps to the target location while combining his twin blades into one, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies upon landing and slowing them by 60% for 1s. (This skill cannot be interrupted.)
Lapu-Lapu gains 3 times the <font color="a6aafb">Bravery Blessing</font> from this skill and skills in transformed state.
For the next 10s, Lapu-Lapu enters <font color="a6aafb">Great Sword</font> stance and gains enhanced skills, 30 extra Physical & Magic Defense, and his Basic Attack damage is increased to 120%.

Lapu-Lapu accumulates 10 <font color="a6aafb">Bravery Blessing</font> each time he deals damage (halved for damage dealt to non-hero units). When <font color="a6aafb">Bravery Blessing</font> is full, Lapu-Lapu's next <font color="a6aafb">Basic Attack</font> will make him dash toward the target, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+150% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (cannot Crit) and granting him a shield that absorbs 250 (+65*Hero Level) damage for 2.5s.

Lapu-Lapu channels for 0.7s, slowing enemies in the target direction by 60%. He then slams his heavy sword to the ground, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and stunning them for 1s.

Lapu-Lapu whirls his heavy sword, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

For each enemy hero hit, Lapu-Lapu gains 10% extra Damage Reduction for 4s.

Lapu-Lapu swings his heavy sword 3 times. The first two attacks deal 345<font color="fba51f"> (+160% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> each, while the third deals 440<font color="fba51f"> (+210% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a large area.

Lapu-Lapu gains Control Immunity during this process and can change his attack direction and move a short distance on each attack.

data.name: Lapu-Lapu

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Balanced damage and survivability to tank through teamfights.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskill2: Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+10% Spell Vamp

recommendmasterplan.name: pyaeshann
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: Hero who defends the Vonetis Islands from outsiders

assist.desc: Lapu-Lapu works well with heroes who can pull enemies together, like Tigreal and Atlas, to allow his AOE skills to hit more targets and get more Damage Reduction from his 2nd Skill in Great Sword stance by hitting more heroes.

strong.desc: Lapu-Lapu is strong against squishy heroes who lack movement abilities, such as Layla and Eudora, because he has high burst damage and can use his mobility to get on top of them.

weak.desc: Lapu-Lapu is countered by agile Marksmen who can knock him away, such as Lesley and Moskov. They can speed up or blink to avoid Lapu-Lapu's Ultimate, and use knockback effects to interrupt his 1st Skill in Great Sword stance or to keep him away.
